definition: time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: I don't think this show is primetime material.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这算不上是黄金时段的节目。

sentences.english: For the first 2-hour block, just do what you'd normally do during that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在头一个两小时的时段里，你按部就班地做事就可以。

sentences.english: For migraine sufferers, summer can be a perilous time of year.
sentences.chinese: 对偏头痛患者来说，夏季是一年中的危险时段。

sentences.english: Is it plausible to ban the costume drama at prime time?
sentences.chinese: 黄金时段将禁播古装剧，这样合理吗？

sentences.english: We ask all our guests to do so to ensure a smooth and rapid check out at busy time…
sentences.chinese: 我们要求客人先付帐以确保在忙碌时段顺利结帐。

sentences.english: The size of the unduplicated audience that listens exclusively to one station within some specified period.
sentences.chinese: 在特定时段内只收听某电台的非重叠听众总量。

sentences.english: I heard that there is an evaluation period for students at the end of each semester.
sentences.chinese: 我听说学生在每个学期末有一个评估时段。

sentences.english: The most vigorous protests, in London and Paris, were played out for prime-time newscasts.
sentences.chinese: 最强烈的伦敦和巴黎抗议报道在黄金时段播出。

sentences.english: The mini-bus is late because of the traffic jams during the rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 下班高峰时段，小公共因为交通堵塞晚点了。

sentences.english: So I have to work very unsocial hours.
sentences.chinese: 所以我要工作非常的时段。

sentences.english: Your sections are going on this week, ! so enjoy yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们的时段从本周开始，尽情享受吧。

sentences.english: These breaks are not only for eating and drinking but also for chatting.
sentences.chinese: 这些休息时段不只是吃吃喝喝而已，也是用来闲聊的。

sentences.english: To advertise during prime time TV is very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 在电视的黄金时段卖广告是很贵的。

sentences.english: Prime-time hits disappear from that season's selection after five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 五周以后黄金时段的成功从当季选择里消失了。

sentences.english: The manager got caught in the morning rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 经理在早晨交通尖峰时段堵在车龙里。

sentences.english: We put out a series of prime-time commercial.
sentences.chinese: 我们在黄金时段播出了一系列商业广告。
